transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Rajesh sir hi main, Namaskar sir main Pallavi bol rahi thi Abhishek ke manager India Mart se how are you?
Customer: Ji mam Ankit badhiya badhiya hu mam sahi hai.
Executive: Han ji sir Abhishek ne vaise jo kam tha catalog pe wo kar diya tha aur aapka concern aaya tha ek mail id ke regarding to wo na do din mein sir by Monday wo mail id bhi aapka solve ho jayega. 
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai wo jo issues aa rahe the na aapko mail id ko lekar. Han ji sir. Ji haan mail id lekar aa raha hai wo.
Customer: Yes yes sir to wo na do din mein solve ho jayega and uske regarding Abhishek aapko fir se Monday ko connect kar lenge that we already discuss in the meeting sir. To abhi na aapka jo concern open tha sir abhi main isko fir close kar du kyuki catalog pe bhi usne pura hi kam kar diya hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Catalog ka to kya mere ko wo chahiye tha ki brochure jo download brochure wala jo option aata hai na. Han haan. Aapke usme yaha pe mujhe apna catalog chahiye tha but wo may be Abhishek sir bol rahe hai ki wo possible nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi sir wo na India Mart ka catalog hai na to we can only add those details matlab catalog waha pe na aapka wahi jayega kyuki wo India Mart ke profile pe aapke product mein wo catalog nahi mil payega sir which is a personal website ka catalog sir wo nahi mil payega. To aap additional chahe na to aap jaise profile mein dekhoge na to ek website pages ka option aata hai sir agar aap profile mein dekhoge jab aap dashboard se profile open karoge na to waha pe ek website pages ka option aata hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To website pages mein aap additional kuch cheeze agar website mein add karna chahe to aap add kar sakte hai just like your jo bhi rewards awards honge aapke jo bhi aapke office ke you know infrastructure photos honge. Ha. Usme usme ek issue ye hai ki like jaise infrastructure images agar main download usme main dal raha hu. Thik hai ab usme wo sirf single image hi leta hai matlab mujhe agar same office ki do se teen angle ki alag alag alag alag alag photos agar mujhe dalne hai to wo usme alag alag category mein usko dalta hai aur jab wo aapko as a customer jab aap usko as a catalog share karte ho to wo one by one aapko dikhta hai matlab as a album type nahi dikhta like samajh rahe ho ki ha jaise main agar images dalta hu like building ki images agar maine dali hai to usme char images mujhe dikhne chahiye. Barabar na lekin wo institutional image mein sirf ek hi single image leta hai uske baad mein agar mujhe second angle ke image dalna hai to mujhe wapas se select karna padega institutional image ya fir dusra koi option select karna padega usme dal sakta hu main wo ek concern mera starting se hai.
Executive: Sir ek kam kar sakte hai kya main waise to iske regarding to dekhiye jo cheeze aap delete ho sakti hai sir wo to humne kari hai but kahi na kahi kuch cheeze main website pages ko lekar abhi main aapka profile bhi open kar rahi hu website pages ko lekar main aapko ye zarur ideate kar sakti hu ki jaise ek na aap profile mein kabhi check kar rahe ho website page ka option.
Customer: Main open nahi hai mere paas mein.
Executive: A nahi profile mein jayiyega na to pehle primary details aata hai fir additional details aata hai fir website pages aata hai. Option open nahi kar rakha hai inhone.
Executive: Ha to waha pe dekhiye aap na agar man lo ki aapko infrastructure facilities add karna hai thik hai to sir yaha pe na dekhiye aap ek bar pehle karoge thik hai fir add customization facilities pe jaoge na to waha pe fir aap dusra bhi kar sakte ho sir add customization facilities pe jayiye aap. Understand understand mera kehne ka matlab ye hai like maine first first maine group select kara hai infrastructure and manufacturing facilities. Ab this is not a single image mujhe isi ke andar teen se char images dalna hai to wo option available nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main batati hu abhi aap yaha pe char se panch customization karke karoge to ho jayega aap ek ek normal example lete hai suppose hum koi bhi profile ko open karte hai kisi bhi random agar hum koi vedanta ki profile ko open kar rahe hai to sir ek about ek three line ka menu type ka options aata hai kisi ki website pe bhi agar google ka website banate hai chahe wo dynamic ho static ho thik hai to waha pe aap dekhna wo cheez waha pe na wo likh ke aata hai jaise about us aayega to about us mein jo jo details aayengi fir ek album karke aata hai fir ek infrastructure karke aata hai to jo bhi column customer open karega na us column mein na dikhega sir jo bhi column customer open karega na waha pe sari cheeze agar infrastructure mein aapne panch add kari to infrastructure mein panch dikhega agar aapne quality infrastructure. Wahi to nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Mam main open karke baitha hu main website agar aap chahe to online le lijiye. Wahi issue aa raha hai na actually kya ho raha hai na like jaise aapke isme jaise customize ka option jo aapne de rakhe hai isme bahut sare options hai like customize packaging distribution network infrastructure setups team facilities logistic and transport but problem kya ho raha hai na agar maine isme se ek option select kara thik hai like maine abhi infrastructure and manufacturing facilities wala option select kara tha maine usme ek image dali signboard ka ab us usi album ke andar main do se teen images nahi add kar pa raha hu. Mera kehna wo hai matlab ek ek category ko choose karne ke baad mein aap sirf ek single image hi usme dal sakte ho.
Executive: Sir to main ek kam karti hu ho sakta hai ye abhi options nahi hua cause mostly customer yaha pe ek to kam bhi nahi karte bahut majority mein bahut hi kam hi customers is pe kam karte hai. Maine Abhishek sir ko ek maine Abhishek sir ko ek concern bhi raise kiya tha may be possibility ho sakta hai ki jaise like hum jaise suppose for an example hum jaise koi software use karte hai. Ji. Ab hame agar hamari team ko wo software same as id ke hisab se use karne ke liye dena hai to hamare paas mein rights hote hai ki hamari team usme se kya open kar sakte hai kya open nahi kar sakti hai okay same is aapke paas mein bhi isme hoga na ki like agar isme mere ko edit aur delete ka hi option aa raha hai lekin usme add multiple images ya add images ka koi na koi option back end se bhi open ho sakta hai. Hmm. Ye may be possibility ho sakti hai kyuki general kya hota hai na ki like aap aap apna personal facebook account hi le lo agar aapko waha pe kuch album mein kuch edit karna hai to wo aapke end pe customization pe hota hai pura aapko kon sa option select karna hai kon sa option nahi select karna hai to same is back office team ke paas mein ye cheez option hogi na like mam aap whatsapp number de payenge aapko mujhe main screenshot bejta hu. Bilkul sir 720 bilkul sir. Just just a minute aap abhi online aa jayenge sir better hoga ki hum ek bar online bilkul one minute sir. Primary mail id hai na aapki. Primary mail id mera aap mere whatsapp number pe aap mujhe link share kariye actually wahi to dikkat aa raha hai mail ka. Sir whatsapp pe actually to koi bhi aap apna personal mail bataye main us pe bej deti hu sir. Just a minute. Ye sales wali pe bej do aap sales@gargisurgical.com jo usme primary hai na wo aap share kar do main waha se link utha lunga usko. Primary pe bej do na. Ha bej dijiye aap main waha se link share kar lunga usko. Main link aapko whatsapp pe waise bejti hu sir but aap na usi se join kijiyega usi mail se. Nahi. Ek kam karo fir rukiye main aapko de raha hu. One minute sir Anurag main call karta hu bhai call pe main. One minute mam. Ha koi baat nahi sir take your time please.
Aapka number batayiye mujhe. 720. 720. 92. 92. 83356. 83356. 53 three sir 123. Okay. 7209283353. Han ji sir.
Pallavi Singh ke naam se aap mera number save kar lijiyega sir. Yeah sure mam. Call link to share kar dijiye.
Ye lijiye maine aapko na mail id share kara isko dal do aap.
Okay. Okay sir wait a minute.
Sir that might be aapko mila hoga mail aap check kare ek bar Pallavi Singh ke naam se aaya hoga. Wait.
Request accept karenge aap. A abhi to aaya nahi hai sir ek minute. Yeah. I receive sir hi sir good morning aap apni screen share karenge sir. Just a minute. Ji aap apni screen share karenge. Main call drop kar du fir hum yahi pe connect kar le laptop pe. Sure chalega. Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to add multiple images to catalog.

- Customer unable to add multiple images in album.



Resolution:

- Executive explained website pages option.

- Executive shared a link to join online.

- Customer shared his email ID for the link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join online to resolve issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, images, website pages, customization, profile
